errorCodes.redirectWindowClosed: Вы закрыли окно для прохождения проверки безопасности :(
errorCodes.mr*: Some technical issue occurred on merchant side. We are working to fix it, so come back and try again later.
errorCodes.fm*: There is an issue with your order. Please double-check all your input data and try again or contact our support team.
errorCodes.fm000016: Sorry, but your order amount is lower than min allowed payment. Put something more in the basket.
errorCodes.fm000017: Sorry, but your order amount is greater than max allowed payment. Put some stuff away from the basket.
errorCodes.fm000018: Order amount is lower than min allowed payment for your chosen payment method. Try to choose another one.
errorCodes.fm000019: Order amount is greater than max allowed payment for your chosen payment method. Try to choose another one.
errorCodes.fm000027: Sorry, but payments from your country are not allowed.
errorCodes.fm000039: You can use only your own bank card for payment.
errorCodes.fm000040: Your country is not restricted for orders.
errorCodes.fm000041: It is required to enter your email.
errorCodes.fm000045: It is required to specify your country.
errorCodes.fm000046: It is required to enter you zip code.
errorCodes.fm000050: We could not recognise your zip code. Try to reenter it.
errorCodes.ph*: Sorry, but we couldn't process your order. We've already got the problem and working on it.
errorCodes.rf*: We stuck into some trouble, processing your refund request. Please try again later or contact our support team
errorCodes.tk*: Something went wrong with your purchase. Please try again later.
errorCodes.ps*: Sorry but your payment can't be processed at the moment
errorCodes.ps000005: Only 3‑D Secure bank cards are allowed to use. Contact your bank for details.
errorCodes.ps000006: 3‑D Secure availability is unknown for your card. Contact your bank for details.
errorCodes.ps000011: You have insufficient funds on your bank account.
errorCodes.ps000016: Seems like you have Internet connection problems. Try again later.
errorCodes.bc000001: Your bank card number is required to fill-in.
errorCodes.bc000002: Your bank card CVV number is required to fill-in.
errorCodes.bc000003: Your bank card expire month is required to fill-in.
errorCodes.bc000004: Your bank card expire year is required to fill-in.
errorCodes.bc000005: Your bank card holder name is required to fill-in.
errorCodes.bc000006: Your bank card expiration year or month is invalid
errorCodes.bc000007: Your bank card is expired. Try to use another one.
errorCodes.bc000008: Your bank card CVV is invalid. Try to reenter it.
errorCodes.bc000009: Your bank card number is invalid. Try to reenter it.
errorCodes.ks*: Something went wrong with your key code. Please try again later or contact our support team to arrange a fix.
